long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An ExpertVoice membership has much to offer. The ExpertVoice Deal Alert, a free Chrome browser extension, is a shopping benefit that notifies you of your ExpertVoice discount before buying products on Amazon. Install the ExpertVoice Chrome extension today to shop like an expert. 

üîç DEAL-CHECK FAST

900+ brands offer insider-only discounts on ExpertVoice.* The Chrome browser extension reveals your unique discount and directs you to the same brand on ExpertVoice for a seamless shopping experience.

üõí SAVE MONEY ON TOP BRANDS

If browsing for a product on Amazon, the bolt instantly lights up in red to notify you of your ExpertVoice discount. Keep your eye on the bolt for cost-saving tips and never overpay again.  

‚ö°Ô∏èHOW IT WORKS

1. Once you‚Äôve installed the ExpertVoice browser extension, you‚Äôll see a small ‚Äúlightning bolt‚Äù on the top right-hand corner of your Chrome toolbar. When you shop on Amazon, an ExpertVoice deal is supported for that product if the lightning bolt illuminates in red.
2. Click ‚ÄúView discounts‚Äù on the notification to open the same brand‚Äôs ExpertVoice store in a separate tab. 
3. On ExpertVoice, search for the same product, complete any required lessons to unlock your discount, and confirm you‚Äôre getting your best price before you buy.**
----------------------------------------------  

*Brand access is based on your ExpertVoice member affiliation.

**Amazon and ExpertVoice are not affiliated. Amazon‚Äôs shipping costs and the member‚Äôs Prime status are not factored into the Chrome browser discount notification. ExpertVoice cannot guarantee that the product is in stock on ExpertVoice.
